title: NATIONWIDE Logo
content:
Hi friends  
please help me id the font used for the logo of NATIONWIDE DEBT CENTER

Thanks in advance

Miguel

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080630101731im_/http:/typophile.com/files/nationwide_4519.jpg)

 [‹ Type ID would be greatly appreciated](http://web.archive.org/web/20080630101731/http:/typophile.com/node/46811 "Go to previous forum topic") [world war two typefaces ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080630101731/http:/typophile.com/node/46803 "Go to next forum topic")
author: hernando

comments.content:
Looks very Century-ish.

Things are as they appear to be; and they are otherwise.
Things are as they appear to be; and they are otherwise.

“D E B T C E N T E R” is Times New Roman.

- Lex
